src:
Slaviša Kokeza potpredsednik Uefine Komisije nacionalnih saveza
Priznanje za FSS

01 Nov 2019

Evropska fudbalska federacija promovisala je predsednika Fudbalskog saveza Srbije u potpredsednika Komisije nacionalnih saveza, jednog od važnijih tela unutar Uefe.
Komisija nacionalnih saveza se naime navi projektima i raspodelom sredstava po nacionalnim savezima.
Predsednik Komisije je Turčin Servet Jardimči, a potpredsednici su Fernando Gomeš (Portugalija), Aleksandar Djukov (Rusija) i Slaviša Kokeza.
Komisija broji 28 članova iz cele Evrope, a Kokeza je na novoj funkciji “debitovao” na sastanku u Ženevi.








Pogledajte novu epizodu serije Ekipizze...




(FOTO: Star Sport)
text:
Slavisa Kokez, Vice President of the Uefa Commission of National Federations
FSS recognition

01 Nov 2019

The European Football Federation has promoted the President of the Football Federation of Serbia to the Vice-President of the Commission of National Federations, one of the most important bodies within Uefa.
Namely, the Commission of National Federations is involved in projects and the distribution of funds by national federations.
The Commission President is Turk Servet Jardimci, and Vice-Presidents are Fernando Gomes (Portugal), Alexander Dyukov (Russia) and Slavisa Kokeza.
The commission has 28 members from all over Europe, with Kokeza making his new debut at a meeting in Geneva.








Check out a new episode of the Ekipizze series ...




(PHOTO: Star Sport)
